<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Veil May](/Feats.aspx?ID=2333) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Born of a blood hag, a fiery blood drinker hidden behind a false skin, you have one blood-red eye and the ability to slough off your appearance in an instant. You gain the [Lie to Me](/Feats.aspx?ID=811) skill feat, and you can shed a disguise quickly by peeling off the outer layer of your skin. Changing from a disguise used to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) back to your true appearance is a 3-action activity for you; if you're an expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), it's a 2-action activity, and if you're legendary in Deception, it takes only a single action. This doesn't allow you to don or remove armor or other equipment any faster, but your physical appearance otherwise returns to its normal state.

<title level="2">Veil May leads to...</title>
[Invoke the Elements](/Feats.aspx?ID=2337)
name: Veil May
